## CosNode class

Computes the cosine function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class CosNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns cos(x) for input x in radians. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
